name: Puzzle Trial
description:
Welcome to Puzzle Trial's first official FULL RELEASE!

I've been working on this on and off for about 6 months, so any donations are appreciated.

This game contains 30 stages in total, spread across 4 courses, one of which has to be unlocked. The difficulty ramps up as the game progresses, so this is a game that can challenge the best players.

This game features my character in the dialogue sections, Rin. Her full design can be found here.
